mapper.insert: insert into bc_cart (member_idx, bread_idx, bread_count) values(#{member_idx}, #{bread_idx}, #{bread_count})
insert into bc_order (order_idx, amount, member_idx) values(#{order_idx}, #{amount}, #{member_idx})
insert into bc_item (bread_idx, bakery_idx, order_idx, bread_count) values(#{bread_idx}, #{bakery_idx}, #{order_idx}, #{bread_count})
mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_idx, c.bread_idx, c.member_idx, b.bread_name, bk.bakery_name, b.bread_price, c.bread_count, b.bread_img_save, bk.bakery_idx FROM bc_cart c INNER JOIN bc_bread b ON c.bread_idx = b.bread_idx INNER JOIN bc_bakery bk ON b.bakery_idx = bk.bakery_idx WHERE c.member_idx = #{member_idx};
mapper.update: update bc_bread set bread_stock = bread_stock - #{bread_count} where bread_idx = #{bread_idx}
